metadata.Plot: Set in the mystical lands of Persia, a rogue prince and a mysterious princess race against dark forces to safeguard an ancient dagger capable of releasing the Sands of Time -- a gift from the gods that can reverse time and allow its possessor to rule the world.
metadata.Writer: Boaz Yakin, Doug Miro, Carlo Bernard
metadata.Actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Gemma Arterton, Ben Kingsley
